damn man... i know the audio is out of sync sometimes and the most critical part of the movie is in russian, and that sucks, definitely, but scene4all hasn't put up much of anything that is garbage, he has worked hard and diligent to bring us awesome movies that are still in theaters or just on dvd and we don't even have to pay for them... so why is everyone hating so much on scene? i mean shit he even warns you that the audio is messed up. give him a break, this one is a fluke, download most of his other shit and it's 8/8 minimum. thanks scene for all the hard work u do for us, i really appreciate it, even if others don't. i would however love to see this movie if you can get a better audio for it... that would be sick. but i'm sure if you had the choice, you wouldn't have uploaded this one heh. anyways, thanks again man, and ignore these haters... they really do appreciate your uploads they just are angry that they don't get what they want when they want it, instead of appreciating what they can get for free. so... American of us... lmao
